001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jetty.server.security.jwt;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004
005import java.util.Collections;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.Optional;
008
009import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration.missing;
010
011public record IssuerConfiguration(Configuration configuration) {
012
013    public Optional<String> getJWKS() {
014        return configuration.getString("jwks");
015    }
016
017    public List<JwtKey> getKeys() {
018        return configuration.getObjectListAs("keys", on -> new JwtKey(new Configuration(on)))
019                .orElse(Collections.emptyList());
020    }
021
022    public record JwtKey(Configuration configuration) {
023        public String getAlg()
024        {
025            return configuration.getString("alg").orElseThrow(missing("alg"));
026        }
027
028        public String getKey()
029        {
030            return configuration.getString("key").orElseThrow(missing("key"));
031        }
032
033        public Optional<String> getKid()
034        {
035            return configuration.getString("kid");
036        }
037    }
038}
